mapper.select: SELECT B.B_NO, B.ID, B.CONTENT, B.IP, B.LOCATION, B.ORIGIN, B.SAVED, B.LIKES, B.CREATED, B.PATH, B.MODIFIED, B.STATE, P.ID, P.P_ORIGIN, P.P_SAVED, P.P_PATH FROM BOARD B, PROFILE P WHERE B.ID = P.ID(+) ORDER BY B_NO desc

SELECT B.B_NO, B.ID, B.CONTENT, B.IP, B.LOCATION, B.ORIGIN, B.SAVED, B.LIKES, B.CREATED, B.PATH, B.MODIFIED, B.STATE, P.ID, P.P_ORIGIN, P.P_SAVED, P.P_PATH FROM BOARD B, PROFILE P WHERE B.ID = P.ID(+) AND B_NO =#{bNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES ( BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{content}, #{ip}, #{location}, #{origin}, #{saved}, #{path}, 0, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, 0, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET CONTENT = #{content}, LOCATION = #{location}, PATH = #{path}, ORIGIN = #{origin}, SAVED = #{saved}, MODIFIED = SYSDATE WHERE B_NO = #{bNo}
